mapper.select: SELECT C.ID, C.TITLE, C.BODY, C.USER_ID, TO_CHAR(C.WRITE_DATE, 'YYYY-MON-DD HH24:MI:SS','nls_date_language=ENGLISH') WRITE_DATE, C.VIEW_COUNT, C.RECOMMEND_COUNT, C.REQUEST_IP, C.DISPLAY_FILE_NAME, M.ID M_ID, M.EMAIL, M.NICKNAME, M.REGIST_DATE FROM COMMUNITY C, MEMBER M WHERE C.USER_ID = M.ID(+) ORDER BY C.ID DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMMUNITY ( ID, TITLE, BODY, USER_ID, WRITE_DATE, VIEW_COUNT, RECOMMEND_COUNT, REQUEST_IP, DISPLAY_FILE_NAME ) VALUES ( COMMUNITY_ID_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{body}, #{userId}, SYSDATE, 0, 0, #{requestIp}, #{displayFilename} )
mapper.select: SELECT C.ID, C.TITLE, C.BODY, C.USER_ID, TO_CHAR(C.WRITE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') WRITE_DATE, C.VIEW_COUNT, C.RECOMMEND_COUNT, C.REQUEST_IP, C.DISPLAY_FILE_NAME, M.ID M_ID, M.EMAIL, M.NICKNAME, M.REGIST_DATE FROM COMMUNITY C, MEMBER M WHERE C.USER_ID = M.ID(+) AND C.ID= #{id}

SELECT C.ID, C.TITLE, C.BODY, C.USER_ID, TO_CHAR(C.WRITE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') WRITE_DATE, C.VIEW_COUNT, C.RECOMMEND_COUNT, C.REQUEST_IP, C.DISPLAY_FILE_NAME, M.ID M_ID, M.EMAIL, M.NICKNAME, M.REGIST_DATE FROM COMMUNITY C , MEMBER M WHERE C.USER_ID= M.ID AND C.USER_ID= #{userID}
